evaluateAsPerOperator

private boolean evaluateAsPerOperator(java.lang.String alValue,
                                      java.lang.String arValue,
                                      java.lang.String anOperator)
                               throws XMLProgLogicException
This method evaluates the condition of the if as per the operator present with the left operand and right operand.

Parameters:
alValue - the left hand operand
arValue - the right hand operand
anOperator - the operator
Returns:
boolean the conditional evaluation
Throws:
XMLProgLogicException

evaluateAsPerOperator

private boolean evaluateAsPerOperator(java.lang.String alValue,
                                      java.lang.String arValue,
                                      java.lang.String anOperator,
                                      java.lang.String anOrMarker)
                               throws XMLProgLogicException
This method evaluates the condition of the if as per the operator present with the left operand and multi-valued right operand.

Parameters:
alValue - the left hand operand
arValue - the right hand operand
anOperator - the operator
Returns:
boolean the conditional evaluation
